Title: Includes the county of Sullivan within the definition of a designated community
Summary: Includes the county of Sullivan within the definition of a designated community for purposes of community preservation funds.
LawCode: Amd ยง6-s, Gen Muni L; amd ยง1560, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the tax law, in relation to including Sullivan county as a designated community for purposes of community preservation funds
